mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO student_subject_grade3(id, latestUpdateDate, yearOfClass, yearOfSemester, subjectId, subjectName, completeType, subjectScore, grade) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.latestUpdateDate}, #{item.yearOfClass}, #{item.yearOfSemester}, #{item.subjectId}, #{item.subjectName}, #{item.completeType}, #{item.subjectScore}, #{item.grade} )
